We have adjusted the traffic flow for this school year. Buses will be using the front drive of the building and parent pick up and drop off will be located at the back of the building. Student drivers will enter with the buses and proceed to the student parking lot. Please see the picture below.

Entrance D is for 7-12 only.

During the PM Pickup-
All students will exit Entrance D according to their family's tag number that will be received on Tuesday AM. If you do not receive a tag Tuesday AM, you will receive one during PM pickup.

Please be patient as we work through this new system over the next couple weeks.

NWOG Sportsmanship Shout Out! Goes to Coach Holland and her Ridgemont 5th grade girls. The Gophers were playing the USV Rams and despite being on the losing end of the contest, I witnessed something worth sharing that "won" my heart.

A gentle giant (coach's term) child "learning" the post position was getting "most of the rebounds" simply because of her height and size. On one particular play, she secured the rebound but in doing so encountered an opponent bouncing off of her and innocently falling to the floor. This Gopher, while grasping the live ball took a step to bend over, offer a hand and help up the uninjured but shaken girl to her feet. Then, simply handed the ball to their point guard to take up the floor and start the offense. Sure...... did she travel? I didn't blow the whistle......I saw more than that extra "step". I saw a sportsmanship "step" in the right direction. Well done Coach and mom and dad!
